Player History
Had first career hit on 3/31/2013, off J.J. Putz (ARI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2013, off Josh Zeid (HOU)...
Traded from Colorado to Cleveland on 6/30/2013 (Going to COL: SS Francisco Lindor, P Trevor Bauer, P Dillon Howard, 1B Nick Swisher. Going to CLE: SS Troy Tulowitzki, P Rex Brothers)...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2013, hitting .406 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2013, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2013...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/6/2015 with a Fractured Knee, out for 6-7 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 5/24/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2017, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Cleveland to Arizona on 7/29/2017 (Going to ARI: SS Troy Tulowitzki, P Tim Lincecum, P Rex Brothers. Going to CLE: 3B Matt Davidson, P Archie Bradley, P Starlin Peralta)...
Won World Series with Arizona in 2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2018, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2018, hitting .391 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 7/4/2018 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/17/2018 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/22/2019 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
11/2/2020: Signed a contract extension with Arizona, $20,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against San Diego on 5/26/2021...
Traded from Arizona to New York (N) on 2/21/2022 (Going to ARI: LF Samuel Perez, P Hector Alcala. Going to NYM: SS Troy Tulowitzki)...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 5/25/2022...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/4/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $3,670,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
8/1/2025: Signed a contract extension with Baltimore, $3,390,000 per year, for 1 years.
Drove in 6 runs against Tampa Bay on 8/10/2025...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/6/2026, off Eugene Fearon (KC)...
